title: client constantly telling me i cant login due to no internet when im clearly online
body:
"were unable to log you in because you may be offline."

clearly im online because im posting this, this has been an ongoing issue for me for about a month were the client just randomly decides whether im offline or online.

ive disabled firewall and turned off all background programs and have done multiple repairs to no avail....

anyone had this issue and found out whats causing it>?

replies.body:
Hiya :)

Have you uninstalled/re-installed? It might help. If you've done that, then I'm not sure (I'm not a computer specialist).

However, if you live near Cambridge and Southern Hamilton (in NZ), some *idiot* cut the ultra-fibre cables meaning EFTPOS, mobile networks, and some internet things aren't working. And it still hasn't been fixed >:( So that may be the issue?
No its a client issue as im never actually offline, tried untinstallin/re install/repair numerous times to no avail.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

Give the Hextech Repair Tool a sus. There may be some file somewhere that's gone horribly wrong or something, but whatever the issue is the tool will at least get you the logs that support will need to help you if the tool itself can't fix the issue.
